casebody.data:
Damon BIGELOW
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2017

David B. Rozwaski, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Chupak, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 206, 167 A.3d 1054 (2017), is denied.
